# Methods: MLR

- Multiple linear regression

- Best subset model selection

- RSS, adj. $R^2$, Cp, BIC

$$
E[y \mid \mathbf{x}] = \beta_0 + \beta_1 x_{1} + ... + \beta_p x_{p} + \epsilon
$$

<!-- methods 2 -->

# Methods: GAM

- Generalized additive model

$$
g(E[y \mid \mathbf{x}]) = \beta_0 + f_1(x_{1}) + f_2(x_{2}) + \cdots + f_p(x_{p}) + \epsilon
$$

# Methods: aET and rET

- absolute evapotranspiration

\begin{align*}
aET &= (ET_{\text{burned,prefire}} - ET_{\text{burned,postfire}}) \\
    &\quad - (ET_{\text{control,prefire}} - ET_{\text{control,postfire}}) \\
rET &= \frac{aET}{ET_{\text{burned,prefire}}} \times 100 \%
\end{align*}
